definition.name: Tabs
definition.description: A high-level wrapper component that provides a tabbed interface using Radix UI's Tab primitives. It serves as the root container for the entire tabs component.

defaultValue.description: The value of the tab that should be active when initially rendered

value.description: The controlled value of the tab that should be active

onValueChange.description: Event handler called when the value changes

children.description: The content of the tabs component (TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent)

definition.name: TabsList
definition.description: The container component for the tab triggers/buttons. Provides a styled container with flex layout and rounded corners that houses the individual tab triggers.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the tabs list

children.description: The tab triggers to be rendered within the list

definition.visualLayout: A horizontal flex container with rounded corners and muted background that contains and arranges the tab triggers

definition.name: TabsTrigger
definition.description: The interactive tab button that users click to switch between different tab contents. Features various states including active, hover, and focus, with appropriate styling for each state.

value.description: A unique value for the tab trigger that corresponds to its content

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the trigger

disabled.description: Whether the tab trigger is disabled

children.description: The content to be displayed within the trigger

interactions: Click to activate the corresponding tab content

definition.name: TabsContent
definition.description: The container component that holds the content for each tab. Content is shown when its corresponding TabsTrigger is active and hidden otherwise.

value.description: A unique value that matches with a TabsTrigger to show/hide this content

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content container

children.description: The content to be displayed when this tab is active

definition.visualLayout: A container with top margin and focus ring styling that displays the tab panel content
